transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ya good afternoon good morning sir main India Mart se baat kar rahi hu sir Akanksha.
Executive: Ya boliye na mam.
Customer: Ya sir actually na ye aapki concern aayi thi regarding like kal aapne sath call ye aayi thi ki aapke pass buylead ki dikkat aa rahi hai na irrelevant buylead ki kuch problem aa rahi hai right?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji to usi ke regarding maine call kiya sir isko ek kam kijiye na abhi main aapko ek task kar deta hu Akanksha ji jitne bhi buyleads maine le liya hai na
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Aapko data dikh raha hai mera to usko ek bar recall karke dekh lijiye koi kehta hai hum jis search kar rahe the maine call kiya hi nahi wrong number whatever thoda sa ek bar ek thoda sa workout kar lijiye main aapko 11:00 11:30 baje aaram se call kar leta hu isi number pe.
Executive: Sir actually so sorry for that but na sir ye aapki jo lead manager hoti hai na sir wo hame nahi show karti hai because ye na private aapki hoti hai wo personal hoti hai baki aapki cheeze jo bhi lead aa rahi hai na jo recent abhi upload hui India Mart pe wo main aapko bata paungi lekin aap jaise agar ek bar free ho jaoge to mujhe share kar doge to main dekh paungi sir lead manager ye aapki hoti hai.
Customer: Kar dunga kar dunga share.
Executive: Hmm ha aap ek bar kar dena usse related jo bhi hogi na yaha pe changes kar dungi sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Nahi changes ki baat nahi hai mam jisko technical word ek agar TV ko TV hi bolte hai hai na.
Executive: Hanji ji.
Customer: Agar quad ko quad hi bolte hai thread ko thread hi bolte hai polyester ko polyester usme alag dalag aap India Mart ke tarah wo world mein jo naam liya jata hai wahi naam hum usko type karenge na wo sab cheeze maine workout do teen bar kiya hai mam ye do teen bar manager change ho chuke hai wo proper nahi hai thoda sa workout.
Executive: Nahi sir actually na pichle bar ha bilkul maine connect bhi kiya tha na sir aapko aap se bola bhi tha ki sir catalog se related kam karni hai to aapne bola tha abhi to Akanksha time nahi hai to main baad mein dunga ye actually.
Customer: Already kar liya hai maine catalog mein pura work maine kar liya hai wahi cheez bar bar karna thik nahi lagti maine khud dekho workout kare rates jo the jo pehle mere manager the kon bhalla Deepika bhalla koi to the mam.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Unhone bola lekin maine wo pura workout karke 75 80 75 aisa leke gaya hu abhi kya usme aur add kuch kar nahi sakte na.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi add nahi karni hai jaise aap category jo hai na wahi aati hai na category agar main mera product ka naam dal dunga na to wahi category aani chahiye na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To sir aapke majorly kya hai na ki sir isme ek bar jaise aap aaoge ek bar video mein jaoge to main na isme jyada se jyada ye kar sakti hu inke keyword jaise hote hai na category mapping wo main change karungi ek bar aur usse aapko jaise dekhungi ki sir kuch bhi relevant agar buylead aa raha hai kyuki uske liye na sir mujhe aapka help chahiye hoga kyuki jaise aapke first product hai nylon multi dipd cheper fabric right to iske aapki category dal rakhi hai nylon fabric to sir isse related wahi mujhe jana hai ki same product se same related category hai ya nahi hai wo mujhe confirm karna padega.
Customer: Actually kya hai main thoda abhi bahar nikalne ja raha hu ghar ke hi hu.
Executive: To koi baat nahi.
Customer: 11:30 12:00 baje free ho jaunga call kar leta hu main.
Executive: Ha sir to main ye concern band kar du kyuki sir wo to main.
Customer: Nahi nahi concern kyu band karna hai mera problem resolve hi nahi hua hai na kya concern band karna hai agar aapko karna hai to kar sakte hai no problem.
Executive: Nahi sir wahi concern dekho aapke bina concern ke nahi na main band kar sakti hu aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi mera aapko lagta hai ki mam ki mera jo problem hai mera concern resolve hua hai.
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Jab tak aap aap keyword change karunge suniye meri baat.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Keyword change kariye keyword change karne ke baad one week mein hum dekh lenge ki is workable or not uske baad hum dekh lenge ki teen char bar aise concern resolve.
Executive: Sir isme kafi time na sir ye open rehta hai thoda problem hota hai aap bhi samjho matlab.
Customer: Nahi wo track to aapka hai na mujhe koi issue nahi hai kyuki mera concern resolve hona ye sabse important hai mam.
Executive: Sir dekho isme to maine aapko kitni bar connect kiya sir ab batao mere end se kahan pe ye reh gayi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with irrelevant buyleads.

- Wants executive to recall and verify buyleads data.

- Wants keyword changes for better category mapping.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead manager is private.

- Executive offered to change category mapping keywords.

- Executive asked for customer's help to identify relevant buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share lead manager details when free.

- Executive will change keywords and check in one week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category mapping, keywords, lead manager
